name: Melodia
description:
In this story-driven, rhythm and resource management game you will find
two different mechanics depending whether it’s day or night.

During the day, help your parishioners at the temple and assist them
in their decisions about their existential crisis.

At night the temple turns into a disco and you give the best party in town.
Cheer up your believers by casting musical spells that will make them dance
as you hit the different sequences synced to the music beat.

Get resources and improve the temple while enjoying references
to the greatest musical figures.

Year 2320, the Internet has evolved into Cyberreality, a virtual world where humans upload their consciousness by performing "The Process", separating body and mind and getting rid of their physical suffering and real-life problems.

As more people leave the physical reality, cities become deserts and society crumbles. However, some people are still reluctant to leave reality. Melodia is one of them.
After many years living away from society, an unexpected twist makes her return
to the city: her mother, former DJ priestess of the disco-temple,
very vocal against “The Process”, has suddenly entered “Cyberreality”. 

Without anyone managing the temple it will end up being destroyed .

Melodia decides to go back and take her mother’s role as a DJ-priestess
to save the disco-temple while finding out what happened to her mother.

Will she be able to maintain her community and keep her believers
in the physical reality?
Or will she give into “The Process” and abandon her world and those who need her?
